name: test4
description: 200mm x 200mm square of aluminium with single 3mm hole

tooling marks / tool marks.description: sanding damage covers approximately 15% of one side of part
two scrape damages that appear as lines of small scratches each over 100mm long on one side of part

oil / residue / grease.note: oil paint has been used in place of oil to make test part easier to handle

tester marks / scratches.description: 4 large scratches each 80-120 mm long on one side of part

vendor error.description: the 3mm hole has not been drilled
